thread.title: Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund Takes $2.5B Stake in GE

title: Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund Takes $2.5B Stake in GE
text:
Published By: Fox Business - Today 
Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund Management has accumulated $2.5 billion in General Electric shares since May, roughly a 1 percent stake....
